segment.source: The following checklist provides a high-level list of items to consider and outlines the steps you should take after you have completed the installation of the Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) Management Server, App-V Streaming Server, and the App-V Desktop Client.
segment.target: The following checklist provides a high-level list of items to consider and outlines the steps you should take after you have completed the installation of the Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) Management Server, App-V Streaming Server, and the App-V Desktop Client.

segment.source: Create firewall exceptions for the App-V Management Server or Streaming Server services.
segment.target: Create firewall exceptions for the App-V Management Server or Streaming Server services.

segment.source: Configuring the Firewall for the App-V Servers
segment.target: Configuring the Firewall for the App-V Servers

segment.source: Verify that the App-V system is functioning correctly by publishing, streaming, and testing the default application.
segment.target: Verify that the App-V system is functioning correctly by publishing, streaming, and testing the default application.

segment.source: How to Install and Configure the Default Application
segment.target: How to Install and Configure the Default Application

segment.source: Configure the App-V Client to use the App-V Streaming Server or other server for streaming by means of the ApplicationSourceRoot, IconSourceRoot, and OSDSourceRoot settings.
segment.target: Configure the App-V Client to use the App-V Streaming Server or other server for streaming by means of the ApplicationSourceRoot, IconSourceRoot, and OSDSourceRoot settings.

segment.source: How to Configure the Client for Application Package Retrieval
segment.target: How to Configure the Client for Application Package Retrieval

segment.source: Understand how to use the .msi file version of sequenced application packages for offline deployment.
segment.target: Understand how to use the .msi file version of sequenced application packages for offline deployment.

segment.source: How to Publish a Virtual Application on the Client
segment.target: How to Publish a Virtual Application on the Client

segment.source: (Optional) Configure SQL Server database mirroring for the App-V database.
segment.target: (Optional) Configure SQL Server database mirroring for the App-V database.

segment.source: How to Configure Microsoft SQL Server Mirroring Support for App-V
segment.target: How to Configure Microsoft SQL Server Mirroring Support for App-V

segment.source: Application Virtualization Deployment and Upgrade Checklists
segment.target: Application Virtualization Deployment and Upgrade Checklists
